languages.text: "Все твои манипуляции шиты белыми нитками. Халатная работа бесталанной старухи, вообразившей себя судьей над теми, кому в подметки не годишься".
"Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."
languages.original_text: "Все твои манипуляции шиты белыми нитками. Халатная работа бесталанной старухи, вообразившей себя судьей над теми, кому в подметки не годишься".

traits.locale_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe. The crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."
"Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe. The crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."
"Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

"Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."
"Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

languages.text: "Eure billigen Manipulationsversuche waren kaum zu ertragen ... das Werk einer talentlosen alten Vettel, die denkt, sie könne in jeder Hinsicht über ihre Vorgesetzten urteilen."
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: "Eure billigen Manipulationsversuche waren kaum zu ertragen ... das Werk einer talentlosen alten Vettel, die denkt, sie könne in jeder Hinsicht über ihre Vorgesetzten urteilen."

languages.text: « Vos tentatives flagrantes de manipulation ne m'ont inspiré que de la pitié. Elles sont l'œuvre grossière d'une vieillarde incompétente qui se croit digne de juger ceux qui lui sont supérieurs sur tous les plans. »
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: « Vos tentatives flagrantes de manipulation ne m'ont inspiré que de la pitié. Elles sont l'œuvre grossière d'une vieillarde incompétente qui se croit digne de juger ceux qui lui sont supérieurs sur tous les plans. »

languages.text: “你公然试图操纵他人，这种行为实在是太丢人了。看起来就像是个没有一丁点能耐的老妖婆，却自以为有资格评判那些各个方面都比她强的人。”
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: “你公然试图操纵他人，这种行为实在是太丢人了。看起来就像是个没有一丁点能耐的老妖婆，却自以为有资格评判那些各个方面都比她强的人。”

languages.text: «Sus burdas manipulaciones eran un espectáculo doloroso. El rudimentario trabajo de una vieja sin talento que cree estar en posición de quienes la superan en todos los aspectos».
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: «Sus burdas manipulaciones eran un espectáculo doloroso. El rudimentario trabajo de una vieja sin talento que cree estar en posición de quienes la superan en todos los aspectos».

languages.text: 「君の露骨な策略は、見るに堪えなかった。自分よりあらゆる点で優れた人たちを裁く価値が自分にはあると思っている、才能のない老いぼれの乱暴な仕事だよ」
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: 「君の露骨な策略は、見るに堪えなかった。自分よりあらゆる点で優れた人たちを裁く価値が自分にはあると思っている、才能のない老いぼれの乱暴な仕事だよ」

languages.text: "Apaçık ortada olan manipülasyon girişimlerine tanık olmak acı vericiydi. Kendisinden her bakımdan üstün olan kişileri yargılamaya cüret eden yeteneksiz, hadsiz, yaşlı bir cadının kaba saba işleri."
languages.original_text: "Your blatant attempts at manipulation were painful to observe — the crude work of a talentless old crone who thinks herself worthy of judging those who are superior to her in every regard."

traits.locale_text: "Apaçık ortada olan manipülasyon girişimlerine tanık olmak acı vericiydi. Kendisinden her bakımdan üstün olan kişileri yargılamaya cüret eden yeteneksiz, hadsiz, yaşlı bir cadının kaba saba işleri."
